;===============================================================
;== ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ==============================
;===============================================================

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crown_england_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition EndedInSettlement
	and SettlementName London
	and IsFactionLeader
	and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and not CultureType greek
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_england

    AcquireAncillary crown_england chance  100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger crown_england_11AI
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition not CharacterIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType england
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_england

    AcquireAncillary crown_england chance  50
;------------------------------------------
Trigger crown_france_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition EndedInSettlement
	and SettlementName Paris
	and IsFactionLeader
	and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and not CultureType greek
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_france

    AcquireAncillary crown_france chance  100
;---------------------------------------------------------------
Trigger crown_ireland_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition EndedInSettlement
	and SettlementName Cork
	and IsFactionLeader
	and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and not CultureType greek
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_ireland

    AcquireAncillary crown_ireland chance  100
;------------------------------------------
Trigger crown_ireland_11AI
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition not CharacterIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType ireland
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_ireland

    AcquireAncillary crown_ireland chance  50
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition not CharacterIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType france
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_france

    AcquireAncillary crown_france chance  50
;------------------------------------------

;--------------------------------------------------------

Trigger crown_hungary_01
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition EndedInSettlement
	and SettlementName budapest
	and IsFactionLeader
	and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and not CultureType greek
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_hungary

    AcquireAncillary crown_hungary chance  100
;--------------------------------------------------------------------
Trigger crown_hungary_11AI
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
	Condition not CharacterIsLocal
	and IsFactionLeader
	and FactionType hungary
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_hungary

    AcquireAncillary crown_hungary chance  50
;--------------------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	and SettlementName Cracow
	and IsFactionLeader
	and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and not CultureType greek
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists crown_poland

;------------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_city_armourer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = armourer
          and Attribute Command > 4

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_town_with_castle_armourer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = c_armourer
          and Attribute Command > 4

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  30 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_castle_with_stables_dread
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= knights_stables
          and Attribute Chivalry < -4

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents12
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait HighPersonalSecurity < 1

    AcquireAncillary bodyguard chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents16
    WhenToTest SabotageMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and I_TurnNumber > 85

    AcquireAncillary explosives chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents42a
    WhenToTest DenouncementMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = inquisitor

    AcquireAncillary executioner chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents48a
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition AgentType = inquisitor

    AcquireAncillary swiss_guard chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents51
    WhenToTest ExecutesAnAssassinOnAMission
    Condition AgentType = inquisitor

    AcquireAncillary swiss_guard chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents52
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not AtSea
          and AgentType = priest
          and CharacterNumTurnsIdle >= 4
          and PopulationOwnReligion >= 80
          and ReligionShift <= 10

    AcquireAncillary monk chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents53
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary secret_love chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agent59
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary royal_escort chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_prim2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Prim >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary chastity_belt chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_prim3
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Prim >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary smothering_bodyguard chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_disciplinarian
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Disciplinarian >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary chastity_belt chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_womaniser2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Girls >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary stunning_handmaiden chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_perverted2
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Perverted >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary stunning_handmaiden chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_paranoid
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Paranoia >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary delicate_blade chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Paranoia >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary smothering_bodyguard chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_spymaster
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait SpyMaster >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary delicate_blade chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_assassinmaster
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait AssassinMaster >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary delicate_blade chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_has_authority
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherAttribute Authority > 4
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary faithful_servant chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princess_dad_was_aesthetic
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition FatherTrait Aesthetic >= 1
          and AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary fine_cosmetics chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger building_townhall_high_islam
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition CharacterReligion islam
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= mayors_palace

    AcquireAncillary eunuch chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger building_castles_islam
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition CharacterReligion islam
          and SettlementBuildingFinished >= fortress

    AcquireAncillary eunuch chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger building_smithy_city
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= armourer

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger building_smithy_castle
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= c_armourer

    AcquireAncillary armour_custom chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit8
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit9
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= racing_track

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger princessinit1
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition AgentType = princess

    AcquireAncillary yappy_little_dog chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit11
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= gunsmith

    AcquireAncillary handgun chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit12
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger assassininit13
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= racing_track

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hereticinit4
    WhenToTest PriestBecomesHeretic

    AcquireAncillary zealous_disciple chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hereticinit5
    WhenToTest PriestBecomesHeretic

    AcquireAncillary naive_knight chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hereticinit6
    WhenToTest PriestBecomesHeretic

    AcquireAncillary false_relic chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger witchinit1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = witch

    AcquireAncillary enchanted_broom chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger witchinit6
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = witch

    AcquireAncillary the_lemegeton chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit6
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= militia_drill_square

    AcquireAncillary paladin chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit7
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= abbey
          and CharacterReligion catholic

    AcquireAncillary choir_boy chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit8
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= mayors_palace

    AcquireAncillary royal_seminarian chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger priestinit9
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= castle

    AcquireAncillary royal_seminarian chance  20 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab

    AcquireAncillary counterfeiter chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit12
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemy_school

    AcquireAncillary merchant_clerk chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_poor_fighter
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    Condition Attribute Command < 4
          and I_TurnNumber > 2

    AcquireAncillary armour_ornate chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusader_5a
    WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget
    Condition IsCrusade
          and CharFactionType hre

    AcquireAncillary knight_teutonic chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger crusader_5b
    WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget
    Condition IsCrusade
          and CharFactionType spain

    AcquireAncillary knight_santiago chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget
    Condition IsCrusade
          and CharFactionType portugal

    AcquireAncillary knight_santiago chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget
    Condition IsCrusade
          and not CharFactionType portugal
          and not CharFactionType spain
          and not CharFactionType hre

    AcquireAncillary knight_stjohn chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget
    Condition IsCrusade
          and not CharFactionType portugal
          and not CharFactionType spain
          and not CharFactionType hre

    AcquireAncillary knight_templar chance  100

Trigger jihads_6
    WhenToTest GeneralTakesCrusadeTarget
    Condition IsJihad

    AcquireAncillary knight_chivalrous chance  100

          and SettlementBuildingExists >= assassins_guild

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= theatre

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adultress_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= coaching_house
          and IsGeneral
          and IsMarried
          and SpouseAttribute Charm < 6
          and Attribute Chivalry < 3

    AcquireAncillary adultress chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition InEnemyLands
          and IsMarried
          and TimeInRegion > 3
          and Trait Loyal < 0
          and Attribute Chivalry < 3

    AcquireAncillary adultress_foreign chance  5

          and IsMarried

Trigger astrologer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= small_church
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= small_chapel
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= small_church_o
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= small_chapel_o
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= small_masjid
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= c_small_masjid
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary astrologer chance  5

;------------------------------------------
Trigger knight_beserker_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and Trait BattleDread > 0

    AcquireAncillary knight_beserker chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger knight_chivalrous_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition not WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and not Trait BattleDread > 0
          and not Trait StrategyDread > 0

    AcquireAncillary knight_chivalrous chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger knight_crusader_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition AgentType = priest
          and I_CrusadeInProgress
          and IsRegionCrusadeTarget
          and CharacterReligion catholic
          and TimeInRegion > 1

    AcquireAncillary knight_crusader chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger knight_dread_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds < 1.2
          and PercentageEnemyKilled > 66
          and not Trait BattleChivalry > 0
          and not Trait StrategyChivalry > 0

    AcquireAncillary knight_dread chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger knight_santiago_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WasAttacker
          and IsGeneral
          and IsOnCrusade
          and WonBattle
          and GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and BattleOdds >= 0.5
          and BattleOdds < 1.5
          and FactionType spain

    AcquireAncillary knight_santiago chance  50

          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary spymaster chance  3 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spymaster_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= thieves_guild

    AcquireAncillary spymaster chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyglass_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= dockyard

    AcquireAncillary spyglass chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger strapping_stallion_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition AgentType = princess
          and FactionBuildingExists = kings_stables

    AcquireAncillary strapping_stallion chance  25 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger swift_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = diplomat
          and FactionBuildingExists >= horse_breeders_guild

    AcquireAncillary swift_steed chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger swordbearer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary swordbearer chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger tax_farmer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition Trait BadTaxman >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary tax_farmer chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger torturer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest ExterminatePopulation
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait StrategyDread > 1

    AcquireAncillary torturer chance  8 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger translator_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and AgentType = diplomat

    AcquireAncillary translator chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger treasurer_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists = great_market
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary treasurer chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trick_abacus_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and not SettlementBuildingExists >= town_hall

    AcquireAncillary trick_abacus chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger trusty_steed_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= earls_stables
          and Trait GoodCavalryGeneral >= 1
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary trusty_steed chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger tutor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    Condition IsGeneral
          and Trait Ignorance <= 1

    AcquireAncillary tutor chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger veteran_warrior_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral
          and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 50

    AcquireAncillary veteran_warrior chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger witch_hunter_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition not AtSea
          and AgentType = priest
          and PopulationHeretic > 15
          and TimeInRegion > 3

    AcquireAncillary witch_hunter chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger witch_hunter_vnv_trigger1
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = priest
          and FactionLeaderTrait ReligiousActivity > 1

    AcquireAncillary witch_hunter chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger construction_relic_shard_of_the_true_cross
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition Attribute Piety > 1
          and SettlementName Tripoli
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists shard_of_the_true_cross
          and not HasAncType Relic

    AcquireAncillary shard_of_the_true_cross chance  10 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger shard_of_the_true_cross_anc_trigger
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement
    Condition Attribute Piety > 1
          and SettlementName Tripoli
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists shard_of_the_true_cross
          and not HasAncType Relic

    AcquireAncillary shard_of_the_true_cross chance  90 

;------------------------------------------

          and SettlementName Antioch
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists holy_lance

Trigger construction_relic_holy_grail
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition Attribute Piety > 3
          and SettlementName Aleppo
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists holy_grail
          and not HasAncType Relic

    AcquireAncillary holy_grail chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger holy_grail_anc_trigger
    WhenToTest GeneralCaptureSettlement
    Condition Attribute Piety > 3
          and SettlementName Aleppo
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists holy_grail
          and not HasAncType Relic

    AcquireAncillary holy_grail chance  80 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger templarleader1	;for france
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
	and Attribute Chivalry >= 4
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists templargm
        and FactionBuildingExists >= templars_minor_ch
	and CharFactionType france  ;more often french...
	and not HasAncType pks_chiv  ;not already holding another chivalric office
          
    AcquireAncillary templargm chance  33  ;so there's a chance for it to go around.

;------------------------------------------
Trigger templarleader2  ;for others
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
	and Attribute Chivalry >= 4
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists templargm
        and FactionBuildingExists >= templars_minor_ch
	and not CharFactionType france  ;more often french...
	and not HasAncType pks_chiv  ;not already holding another chivalric office
          
    AcquireAncillary templargm chance  10  ;so there's a chance for it to go around.

;------------------------------------------
Trigger teutonleader1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists teutongm
        and FactionBuildingExists >= teutonic_knights_minor_ch
	and not CharFactionType hre
	and not HasAncType pks_chiv  ;not already holding another chivalric office
          
    AcquireAncillary teutongm chance  10  ;low chance, as the HRE gets higher odds

;------------------------------------------
Trigger teutonleader2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists teutongm
        and FactionBuildingExists >= teutonic_knights_minor_ch
	and CharFactionType hre
	and not HasAncType pks_chiv  ;not already holding another chivalric office
          
    AcquireAncillary teutongm chance  33  ;low chance, as the HRE and Denmark get higher odds

;------------------------------------------
Trigger hospitalleader
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists hospitalgm
        and FactionBuildingExists >= st_johns_minor_ch
	and not HasAncType pks_chiv  ;not already holding another chivalric office
          
    AcquireAncillary hospitalgm chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger santiagoleader1
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists santiagogm
        and FactionBuildingExists >= knights_of_santiago_minor_ch
	and not CharFactionType spain
	and not HasAncType pks_chiv  ;not already holding another chivalric office
          
    AcquireAncillary santiagogm chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger santiagoleader2
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
	and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists santiagogm
        and FactionBuildingExists >= knights_of_santiago_minor_ch
	and CharFactionType spain
	and not HasAncType pks_chiv  ;not already holding another chivalric office
          
    AcquireAncillary santiagogm chance  33

;------------------------------------------
Trigger marshall_player
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	and EndedInSettlement
	and IsFactionLeader
        and SettlementBuildingExists >= garrison_quarters  ;so you must have a castle
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= knights_stables  ;level 2 stables- again IN a CASTLE
	and FactionIsLocal ;for player only
	and not FactionwideAncillaryExists marshall
          
    AcquireAncillary marshall chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger marshall_ai
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and EndedInSettlement
        and SettlementBuildingExists >= garrison_quarters  ;so you must have a castle
	and SettlementBuildingExists >= knights_stables  ;level 2 stables- again IN a CASTLE
	and not FactionIsLocal ;for ai
	and not FactionwideAncillaryExists marshall
	and not HasAncType office
          
    AcquireAncillary marshall chance  50

;------------------------------------------
Trigger construction_relic_iron_crown_of_lombardy
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition Attribute Piety > 1
          and SettlementName Constantinople
          and not I_WorldwideAncillaryExists iron_crown_of_lombardy
          and not HasAncType Relic

    AcquireAncillary iron_crown_of_lombardy chance  10

Trigger hair_from_mohammeds_beard_father_anc_trigger
    WhenToTest FatherDiesNatural
    Condition Attribute Piety > 1
          and FatherAnc hair_from_mohammeds_beard
          and not HasAncType Relic

    AcquireAncillary hair_from_mohammeds_beard chance  90

Trigger sir_william_wallace_anc_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1
          and FactionType scotland
          and GeneralFoughtFaction england
          and I_TurnNumber >= 106
          and I_TurnNumber <= 118

    AcquireAncillary sir_william_wallace chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition IsGeneral
          and WonBattle
          and BattleOdds < 1
          and FactionType france
          and GeneralFoughtFaction england
          and Attribute Command > 3
          and I_TurnNumber >= 170
          and I_TurnNumber <= 180

    AcquireAncillary joan_of_arc chance  100

    Condition IsCrusade
          and Attribute Chivalry > 0
          and I_TurnNumber >= 5
          and I_TurnNumber <= 50

    AcquireAncillary peter_the_hermit chance  25

    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= alchemy_school
          and I_TurnNumber >= 130
          and I_TurnNumber <= 150
          and CultureType southern_european
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType portugal
          and not FactionType papal_states

    AcquireAncillary francesco_petrarca chance  100

          and CharacterReligion catholic
          and not FactionType hre

Trigger gerard_de_ridefort
    WhenToTest GeneralJoinCrusade
    Condition IsCrusade
          and CharacterReligion catholic
          and not FactionType hre
          and not FactionType spain
          and not FactionType portugal
          and I_TurnNumber >= 30
          and I_TurnNumber <= 52

    AcquireAncillary gerard_de_ridefort chance  100

;------------------------------------------
Trigger chancellor_player
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and EndedInSettlement
	  and IsFactionLeader
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= council_chambers
	  and FactionIsLocal ;for player only
	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists chancellor
          
    AcquireAncillary chancellor chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger chancellor_ai
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	and EndedInSettlement
	and not IsFactionLeader
	and not IsFactionHeir
        and SettlementBuildingExists >= council_chambers
	and not FactionIsLocal ;for ai
	and not FactionwideAncillaryExists chancellor
	and not HasAncType office
          
    AcquireAncillary chancellor chance  75

;------------------------------------------
Trigger privy_player
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral	
	  and IsFactionLeader
	  and FactionIsLocal ;for player only
	  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists privyseal
          
    AcquireAncillary privyseal chance  100

;-------------------------------------------
Trigger ren_palanga
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	;and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and SettlementName Palanga
	and IsGeneral
	;and not IsFactionLeader
	;and not IsFactionHeir
	;and FactionIsLocal
	;and Trait TurnsAlive > 1
	;and not HasAncType dearmad_her
	and not FactionwideAncillaryExists ren_palanga
          
    AcquireAncillary ren_palanga chance  100

;-------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	;and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and SettlementName ancona
	and IsGeneral
	;and not IsFactionLeader

	and not FactionwideAncillaryExists ren_ancona
          
    AcquireAncillary ren_ancona chance  100

Trigger ren_oran
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
	;and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and SettlementName oran
	and IsGeneral
	;and not IsFactionLeader
	;and not IsFactionHeir
	;and FactionIsLocal
	;and Trait TurnsAlive > 1
	;and not HasAncType dearmad_her
	and not FactionwideAncillaryExists ren_oran
          
    AcquireAncillary ren_oran chance  100

;-------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd

	;and not CultureType middle_eastern
	and SettlementName hrodna
	and IsGeneral
	;and not IsFactionLeader

		  and not CharacterReligion islam		  
		  and IsGeneral
		  
		  
		  ;and not HasAncType dearmad_her
		  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists dearmad_vienna
          
    AcquireAncillary dearmad_vienna chance  100 

;------------------------------------------

		  and SettlementName Innsbruck
		  and not CharacterReligion islam

Trigger dearmad_edessa
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
		  and SettlementName Edessa
		  and not CharacterReligion islam
		  and IsGeneral
		  
		  
		  ;and not HasAncType dearmad_her
		  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists dearmad_edessa
          
    AcquireAncillary dearmad_edessa chance  100

		  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists idearmad_smolensk
          
    AcquireAncillary idearmad_smolensk chance  100

Trigger idearmad_dongola
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
		  and SettlementName Dongola
		  and CharacterReligion islam
		  and IsGeneral
		  
		  
		  ;and not HasAncType idearmad_her
		  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists idearmad_dongola
          
    AcquireAncillary idearmad_dongola chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger idearmad_fortaleza
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement	
		  and SettlementName Fortaleza
		  and CharacterReligion islam
		  and IsGeneral
		  
		  
		  ;and not HasAncType idearmad_her
		  and not FactionwideAncillaryExists idearmad_fortaleza
          
    AcquireAncillary idearmad_fortaleza chance  100
